meanings.definition: Relating to or involving different generations.
meanings.sent1: The intergenerational picnic brought together grandparents, parents, and children.
meanings.sent2: The intergenerational program at the community center promotes understanding between age groups.
meanings.sent3: The intergenerational game of charades had everyone laughing and guessing together.
meanings.sent4: The intergenerational bond between siblings is unbreakable, no matter the age gap.
meanings.sent5: The intergenerational storytelling session captivated listeners of all ages.

meanings.definition: Passed down from one generation to another.
meanings.sent1: The intergenerational tradition of baking cookies at Christmas has been cherished for decades.
meanings.sent2: The intergenerational wisdom shared by the elders is invaluable to the younger members of the community.
meanings.sent3: The intergenerational recipe for apple pie has been a family secret for years.
meanings.sent4: The intergenerational heirloom clock ticked in the hallway, a reminder of the past.
meanings.sent5: The intergenerational knowledge of farming techniques was essential for the survival of the village.
